Text:
Remind me, when did I agree to be your personal
fisherwoman and monster slayer?
...Here you go, Gamma.
What's in this sandwich?

It's a deep-fried sea bream sandwich with tartar
sauce.
Sounds luxurious... Alright, here goes.
Gaaah!!!

I'm finally getting used to your dramatic
reactions...
It's absolutely delicious!

The acidity of the tartar sauce gently escorts the
elegantly deep-fried sea bream—a sophisticated
dish suitable as an hors d'oeuvre for any of the
nobles' social gatherings.
But isn't sea bream...pricey?
Stop worrying so much about the costs.

Now you're starting to sound like Eta. Besides, what
am I supposed to do? It's part of my job.

Sea bream is sold as a luxury fish in the capital's
fish markets. So yeah, it's not something you ever
see getting served to peasants.

Besides, looking at the ratio of fish we've caught so
far, there's only one sea bream for ten tuna. It's
certainly no easy catch.

The sea bream sandwich idea is too good to discard,
but even if we're aiming for a more high-end clientele,
we'll have to lay the groundwork for our business first.

Wait, did Master Shadow tell me about tuna sandwiches
and tartar sauce, knowing full well that Gamma and
Eta would get involved?!
If so...hehe...he's a genius...
Zeta?
...Wanna try some onion rings?

Another of those things you said weren't worth the
labor, but they're delicious.
...I'll try one for research.
Just be honest and admit you like eating good food.
Well...of course, I do, but—

When it comes to your business, you're going to deal
with people who feel that way, right?

Then shouldn't you value those same feelings and
sensations inside yourself?
Oh!
You really know how to analyze your subjects.

Well, I'm an intelligence operative, so it's all part of
the job.
Zeta—

...Deep-fry some squid while you're at it! I'll chase
away any monsters that show up!
Yeah, yeah...
What! Already?!
Well, good luck taking them out.
...You know, I'm kinda starting to enjoy this.

The sea breeze is so soothing... Been a while since
I've felt this way.

...So what was supposed to be a fun fishing trip
resulted in me helping Gamma develop products.
I see...

(That said, she managed to get Gamma to go along with
her and act as a monster deterrent.)

(And she had Gamma taste everything she made first,
sort of as a food taster or guinea pig.)

(Zeta knows how to get what she wants—she's a shrewd
one!)

The tuna sandwich and tartar sauce were absolutely
amazing. I don't seem to tire of them...which
surprised me.

(I guess even the fickle Zeta really likes fish. It's
good to have something you enjoy catching and
eating.)

Gamma wants to set up a tuna sandwich stall in the
capital and eventually open a permanent store with
sea bream, beef, onion rings, and squid rings on the
menu.
Wait, that sounds just like—
Like?
..."Tuna King"!
Tuna...King?

You three have discovered on your own the wisdom I
sought to bestow on you—that's a sure sign of growth.

Gamma would never have been able to achieve this on
her own. You and Eta's assistance equipped her with
the toolkit to achieve these exceptional results.
The result is a new Shadow Wisdom—Tuna King!
Tuna King...?! Wisdom we discovered on our own...?!

We only discovered this wisdom because that was what
you wanted!

Your wisdom is always far beyond my imagination or
expectation—that is why I follow you, my lord!

(I just blindly threw out a bunch of words I thought
might sound convincing, but it looks like everything
worked out...I guess?)

(That said, both the capital and this world are vast.
I'm sure someone out there's already opened a
similar sort of shop.)
